page.title: 17Agricultural Merchants
page.content: Using a site that used to be the old mill for the area{Badcock and {Evered Ltd}have been supplying the needs of the farming community for nearly{50 years. Provided{jobs for fifteen}local people the company serves the needs of a wide area. Up to 400 farmers, smallholders, riding stables and poultry come from up to thirty miles away to the bustling premises just opposite the remains of Old Cleeve Abbey. {Three lorries and their drivers are kept very busy travelling to {Avonmouth}to collect goods in bulk. They also go to places such as Exeter to collect quantities of grain and fertiliser. This makes sure that there is always a wide range of seeds, feeds and chemicals in stock.
